Package org.springframework.web.servlet.view.json

Support classes for providing a View implementation based on JSON serialization.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MappingJackson2JsonView
    Spring MVC View that renders JSON content by serializing the model for the current request using Jackson 2's ObjectMapper.
    MappingJacksonJsonView
    Spring MVC View that renders JSON content by serializing the model for the current request using Jackson 1.x's ObjectMapper.

Package org.springframework.web.servlet.view.json Description

Support classes for providing a View implementation based on JSON serialization.
